name: Car Racing Adventure - Game Impossible "Fun and Passion"
name_original: Car Racing Adventure - Game Impossible "Fun and Passion"
description:
*** feel the thrill of racing in most realistic driving testing game on your apple devices. Steer onto different environments, weather conditions and racing zones.***

improve your racing skills and earn virtual cash to buy your favorite naturally aspirated sports car.Car Racing Adventure delivers hugely fun arcade action. Drive fast and fearless.

Beautiful graphics with realistic scenarios will make the game an addictive one for all those who love to drive. Get ready for fantasy racing mania in multiple game mode.

Endless Mode:

Trick-out your custom racer car and weave through traffic chaos as a legend driver. Drive your car through highway traffic, avoid to collide with rivals. Collect fuel pack and other pickup to keep survive for long time.


Carrier Mode :
Immerse yourself in an adventure of thunder speed! Start your career in real racing on asphalt tracks, start engine and start winning fame and glory. Fast run through the race allows you to have hope being at the top of the rank. Push the limits - rush the traffic and pursuit greatness.

How to Play:
- Tilt your device to steer left or right
- Tap on the screen for brake and reverse
- Speed booster is on the right bottom side of the screen
- Collect different pickups from track

Game Features:
- Incredible real racing experience
- 3 detailed environments
- Simple and Initiative gameplay
- All modes are unlocked
- Support on iphones, ipad as well as ipad pro.
- smooth and realistic driving
